text: Akysis recavus is a species of fish in the family Akysidae, the stream catfishes. It is native to Thailand, where it occurs in the Chao Phraya River. It has also been reported from Laos.Froese, R. and D. Pauly, Editors. Akysis recavus. 2015. FishBase. This fish was described to science in 1998. Little is known about the biology of the species.Ng, H. H. 2012. Akysis recavus. The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Version 2014.3. Downloaded on 26 March 2015. ==References== ==External links== *Akysis recavus. Florida Museum of Natural History. Category:Akysidae Category:Fish of Thailand Category:Fish described in 1998
title: Akysis recavus
